title: "Score analysis in ExtractTopFeatures in CountClust"
author: "Kushal K Dey"
date: "8/24/2017"
output: html_document
---

```{r echo=FALSE, eval=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(CountClust)
library(maptpx)
library(ggplot2)
library(MAST)
library(GSEABase)
library(Seurat)
```


## PBMC (sorted + unsorted) 68K data analysis

```{r}
topic_clus <- get(load("../output/10X_genomics_pooled_sort_unsort_maptpx.rda"))
```

### K=5

```{r}
out <- ExtractTopFeatures(topic_clus[[5]]$theta, top_features = 100, method = "poisson", options = "max")
indices <- out$indices
scores <- out$scores
```

```{r}
par(mfrow = c(3,3))
for(m in 1:5){
  plot(log(1:100), log(scores[m,]+1), col="black", pch=20, ylab = "scores", xlab="top 100 genes (sorted)",
       main = paste0("cluster-", m))
}
```


### K=8

```{r}
out <- ExtractTopFeatures(topic_clus[[8]]$theta, top_features = 100, method = "poisson", options = "max")
indices <- out$indices
scores <- out$scores
```

```{r}
par(mfrow = c(3,3))
for(m in 1:8){
  plot(log(1:100), log(scores[m,]+1), col="black", pch=20, ylab = "scores", xlab="top 100 genes (sorted)",
       main = paste0("cluster-", m))
}
```


### K=10

```{r}
out <- ExtractTopFeatures(topic_clus[[10]]$theta, top_features = 100, method = "poisson", options = "max")
indices <- out$indices
scores <- out$scores
```

```{r fig.height = 8}
par(mfrow = c(4,3))
for(m in 1:10){
  plot(log(1:100), log(scores[m,]+1), col="black", pch=20, ylab = "scores", xlab="top 100 genes (sorted)",
       main = paste0("cluster-", m))
}
```


### QQplot 

```{r}
par(mfrow = c(3,3))
for(m in 1:dim(scores)[1]){
  qqnorm(log(scores[m,]+1), col="red", pch=20, cex = 1, main = paste0("QQplot: cluster - ", m))
  qqline(log(scores[m,]+1))
}
```
